title: Test
summary: This grouped bar chart has 9 categories of IT category on the x axis representing 3 groups: 2017, 2018, and 2019.
Averaging these 3 groups, the highest category is found for IT category Big data / analytics with a mean value of 44.0.
Followed by Enterprise architecture with a mean value of 34.33.
The lowest category is observed at Artificial intelligence that has a mean value of 13.0
showing a difference of 108.8% with the maximum value.

In case of Big data / analytics, 2017 shows more dominance than any other IT category with a value 42.0 and it has the lowest value 0.0 in Artificial intelligence.  However, 2019 being the 2nd most important group, has the highest value 44.0 for IT category Big data / analytics and the lowest 0.0 in case of Development.
